product_name: Long and Ell Ponds Trail Map - Rhode Island
long_description: Slip this handy map in your pocket for biking adventures in Rhode Island's Long and Ell Ponds Natural Area. Details topography, trails and roads. Durable map paper is waterproof and won't wear out at the folds. Measures 17.5 x 9.25 in. open, 4.5 x 3.5 in. folded. Copyright 2004, Cliff Vanover.
short_description: Slip this handy map in your pocket for biking adventures in Rhode Island's Long and Ell Ponds Natural Area.
